cabins.cabin_type.ONE_BED.name: Loner cabin
cabins.cabin_type.ONE_BED.description.li: The perfect cabin for the loner.
Single room cabin where you can sit and think about life and stuff.
Includes one bottle of Talisman whisky.
cabins.cabin_type.TWO_BEDS.name: Two beds cabin
cabins.cabin_type.TWO_BEDS.description.l: Perfect for friends or couples that have grown apart.
Beautiful view from the room window.
cabins.cabin_type.TWIN_BED.name: Twin bed cabin
cabins.cabin_type.HOST_BED.name: Share bed with the host
cabins.cabin_type.HOST_BED.description.l: A unique chance to share bed with the owner of the Hotel facilities.
Top rated experience by previous costumers.
Toilet, high speed internet, TV (now with more than 4 channels!), open fireplace and more!
